monogr.title: Theses mathematicae de optica. Propugnabuntur a Jacobo Cassini Parisino, die Veneris 10. Augusti M.DC.XCI a tertia ad Vesperam, in Collegio Mazarinaeo. Problemata solvet frater ejus Joannes-Baptista Cassini Parisinus, die 2. Septembris M.DC.XCI a tertia ad Vesperam, in Observatorio Regio. Arbiter erit Petrus Varignon, e Regia Scientiarum Academia, & in Collegio Mazarinaeo Matheseos Professor
